verses.roman:
śuni' ānandita rājā ati-śīghra āilā
prabhu dekhi' daṇḍavat bhūmete padilā

synonyms: śuni'-hearing; ānandita—very pleased; rājā—the King; ati-śīghra—hastily; āilā—came; prabhu dekhi'-seeing Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; daṇḍavat—obeisances offered falling flat; bhūmete—on the ground; paḍilā—fell down. obeisances offered falling flat; bhūmete—on the ground; paḍilā—fell down.
translation: The King was very happy to hear the news, and he hastily went there. Upon seeing the Lord, he fell flat to offer Him obeisances.
